Description: Antismash allows the genome-wide identification, annotation and analysis of secondary metabolite biosynthesis gene clusters
EDAM_operation: Sequence clustering, Gene prediction, Differential gene expression analysis
EDAM_topic: Molecular interactions, pathways and networks, Gene and protein families
bio.tool_description: Rapid genome-wide identification, annotation and analysis of secondary metabolite biosynthesis gene clusters in bacterial and fungal genomes. It integrates and cross-links with a large number of in silico secondary metabolite analysis tools that have been published earlier.
